cipheringPackage

Class Encryption

  • java.lang.Object
    • cipheringPackage.Key
      • cipheringPackage.Cipher
        • cipheringPackage.Encryption
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Encryption
extends Cipher
    This is Encryption Class that extends the Cipher Class it performs all the encryption work and stores the cipher-text(which is the final-wanted result)in the Cipher class private field "cipherText"
    Version:
    05/10/2016
    Author:
    Yahya Almardeny
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      void encrypt(Language language)
      Method to encrypt the plain-text
      void generateHomophons(Language language)
      This methods generate the homophones randomly and fill it in the homophones table each column of the table is called a strip the size of each strip is calculated carefully to fit every language in an optimum way
